data.title: Cape Air's Eastern Montana Airports
data.meta_description: Montana airport information and details for Cape Air's Eastern Montana airports, including Billings, Havre, Glendive, Sidney, Glasgow and Wolf Point.
data.text:
Take a moment to familiarize yourself with individual airport policies and check-in procedures. The links below provide directions and everything you need to ensure a smooth trip. All airports require that you present a current, government-issued photo identification such as a driver's license upon check-in.

Montana Airports

Billings

Click here for information and directions to Billings Logan International Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Phone: (406) 248-3647

Havre

Click here for information and directions to Havre City-County Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Phone: (406) 265-3396

Sidney

Click here for information and directions to Sidney-Richland Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Phone: (406) 317-5360

Glendive

Click here for information and directions to the Dawson Community Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Phone: (406) 317-5352

Glasgow

Click here for information and directions to the Valley County Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Phone: (406) 317-5354

Wolf Point

Click here for information and directions to the L.M. Clayton Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Phone: (406) 317-5358
